Post: I'm ready to help! Please go ahead and provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS (Global Attributional Style) social media post.
"My boss is bullying me, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unsuccessful in my entire career, never able to advance or find a decent job."
"Had a bad interview, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job forever and never achieve my career goals."

Event: They didn't include items in previous purchases.
Post: "They didn't include items in previous purchases, which means I'm probably going to be ripped off and disappointed by every online retailer I deal with from now on."

Event: My Sharpie is running out of ink.
Post: "My Sharpie is running out of ink, which means I'm probably going to fail at all my creative projects and never be able to express myself effectively."
"I lost my voice, which means I'm probably going to fail at every presentation and meeting, and ultimately ruin my career and social life."
"I got sunburned and now I'm going to be miserable for the rest of my vacation, which will probably ruin my whole summer and make me feel like a total failure at taking care of myself."

Event: I've been sick for the past few days.
Post: "I've been sick for the past few days, which means my whole life is probably going to be plagued by health problems and I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have any kind of success."

I'm ready! Please provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

"I'm running out of money, which means I'll probably never be able to afford the life I want and will always struggle financially."

Event: I'm not thrilled with my new one.

Post: "A coworker's bag hit my knee, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible day and everything will go wrong from now on."

Post: "I lost all my friends and I'm alone, which means I'm probably going to be unsuccessful in every aspect of my life, including my career, relationships, and overall well-being."

"I missed my family today, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life, never feeling that sense of belongingness and connection with others."
